summary: The customer service agent provided the customer with information about the product phone that comes with the plans offered by Contoso Wireless. The phone has a 5.5 inch HD display, 16MP rear camera, 8MP front camera, and a powerful quad-core processor. It also comes with 64GB of internal storage, expandable up to 128GB with a microSD card. The customer service agent also provided information about the available plans, including a basic plan with unlimited talk and text plus 2GB of data for $40/month, an intermediate plan with unlimited talk and text plus 4GB of data for $50/month, and a premium plan with unlimited talk and text plus 10GB of data for $60/month.
